articles.author: Jonathan Edwards
articles.title: MAGA is fighting a ‘civil war’ over H-1B visas. Here’s what they are. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Right-wing figures are fighting over H-1B visas that allow highly qualified workers to join the American workforce. Here’s what the permits do.
articles.content:
High-profile supporters of President-elect Donald Trump are publicly fighting a civil warover the legal immigration of highly skilled workers.
Supporters of the decades-old H-1B visas say the progra… [+740 chars]
